attribute nsISimpleEnumerator stateDatastores
 Enumerator of available datastore types. Enumerator of available datastore types. The enumerated nsISupports should always QI to a sbIStateDatastore interface.

Detailed Description

[USER CODE SHOULD NOT REFERENCE THIS CLASS]

This interface is implemented as a singleton service. This interface should only be used by code implementing the sbIStateObject interface.

See also:
sbIStateObject
Note:
This interface *is* threadsafe. Implementations should follow this assumption.

Definition at line 49 of file sbPIStateService.idl.

Member Function Documentation

void sbPIStateService::addStateObject ( in sbIStateObject  aStateObject,
in boolean  aPersistentObject 
)

Add a state object to the state service repository.

Adding a state object to the state service repository is automatic upon creation of a state object.

void sbPIStateService::removeStateObject ( in sbIStateObject  aStateObject  ) 

Remove a state object to the state service repository.

Removing a state object from the state service repository is automatic upon destruction of a state object.
